prev.title: Functions of the Grid: Merging Two Items

title: Functions of the Grid: Switching Organizations
body:
Functions of the Grid: Switching Organizations¶

Some users may be a member of more than one organization. All of the features contain records specific to the associated organization, so you must switch to another organization to view its data.
To make this switch, follow the steps below.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. If your current organization name is not displayed, click until your organization name is shown

  3. Click on your current organization

  4. Click the organization to which you would like to switch
